Name: ChickenZ
About the game: ChickenZ is an arena shooter where you have to fight in a post-apocalyptic location against crowds of angry zombies that will try to eat you. After each wave, choose improvements, destroy as many terrible brain-eaters as possible and save yourself from this zombie madness. The game offers a varied selection of weapons, upgrades, and interesting arenas for battling the dead.
